title: Book of Light and Day

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Book of Light and Day is a holy text of the Menaphite Pantheon.[1] The text is known to contain the story Tumeken's dream journey, during which Tumeken created the lesser deities Crondis, Apmeken, Het, and Scabaras.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Book of Light and Day

The Book of Light and Day is a holy text of the Menaphite Pantheon.[1] The text is known to contain the story Tumeken's dream journey, during which Tumeken created the lesser deities Crondis, Apmeken, Het, and Scabaras.

The Sphinx in Sophanem recounts this story in detail, as does the High Priest of Icthlarin. It is unknown what other information the book contains.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Sphinx, Old School RuneScape. "The Book of Light and Day says that Tumeken once fell into a deep sleep and dreamt for four days and four nights."
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
The '''Book of Light and Day''' is a holy text of the [[Menaphite Pantheon]].{{CiteNPC |npc=Sphinx |quote=The Book of Light and Day says that Tumeken once fell into a deep sleep and dreamt for four days and four nights. }} The text is known to contain the story Tumeken's dream journey, during which [[Tumeken]] created the lesser deities [[Crondis]], [[Apmeken]], [[Het]], and [[Scabaras]].

The [[Sphinx]] in [[Sophanem]] recounts this story in detail, as does the [[High Priest (Sophanem)|High Priest of Icthlarin]]. It is unknown what other information the book contains.
